fields.name: Bronze Package รป Foundation Support
fields.description: Our basic tutoring package for students that need a little help along the way.
fields.feature2: Access to a shared folder with study tips, notes and resources
fields.ideal_for: Students looking for targeted help with challenging topics or staying on track.

fields.name: Silver Package รป Academic Boost
fields.description: Our mid-tier package for students who want regular support and deeper content coverage.
fields.feature2: Access to a shared folder with study tips, notes and resources
fields.ideal_for: Students who want consistent support throughout the block.

fields.name: Gold Package รป Full IB Subject Mastery
fields.description: Our premium package  for students that want several points of contact and review.
fields.feature2: Custom revision schedules + past paper practice
fields.feature4: Access to a shared folder with study tips, notes and resources
fields.ideal_for: Students who want comprehensive support, structure, and accountability for exam success.
